name: Nomads (zelophed)
description:
A handful of pixel dudes set out to challenge the treacherous skies with their tree-powered floating hookshot-lighthouse!

Make passing floating islands join up with your vessel, harvest their treasures and expand your grounds, keeping your Nomad crew afloat for as long as possible!

Controls:

  • Press Spacebar to toggle between Hookshot and Bombs
  • Press Left Click to Shoot
  • Hold Left Click and drag to steer the hooked island
  • Scroll the Mouse Wheel to adjust your Islands' travel speed

Soundtracks used:

Umbrella Pants by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4559-umbrella-pants

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Game submission for the #GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme "Joined Together".
